entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
